content: materials - 2 4 skeins of purl soho s blackbird linen 1 100% french linen yarn each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 175 yards/ 100 grams approximately 330 570 total yards required we used ink blue for one sample and galapagos teal for the other - us 6 4 mm 16-inch circular knitting needles 2 - us 6 24- or 32-inch circular knitting needles depending on size you are making - a set of us 5 3 75mm double pointed needles 3 for i-cord - removable stitch markers 4 including one unique - a crochet hook 5 and scrap yarn for provisional cast on gauge 20 stitches and 26 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch with yarn doubled using larger needles sizes small large - finished circumference 24 32¾ inches - finished height 6 8 inches excluding bottom - base of bag 10¼ inches long x 4½ inches wide 14¼ inches long x 6½ inches wide - strap length 10 13 inches - handle drop approximately 5 6 5 inches sample the ink blue bag is the small size and the galapagos teal bag is the large size designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 6 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 7 1 https //www purlsoho com/blackbird-linen html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--crochet_hooks html 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 7 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
